        private int[] mergeSort(int[] array,

      • merge

        private void merge(int[] array,
                   int[] leftArray,
                   int[] rightArray,
                   int sizeOfLeftArray,
                   int sizeOfRightArray)
        This method used for sort left and right part of arrays.
        Parameters:
        array - - list that will get sorted part.
        leftArray - - left part of array.
        rightArray - - right part of array.
        sizeOfLeftArray - - size of left part of array.
        sizeOfRightArray - - size of right part of array.
